title: Jerk Chicken Fingers with Honey-Mustard Sauce (400 calories)
directions: 1. Trim fat from chicken. Cut each chicken piece lengthwise into 3/4-inch-wide strips. In shallow dish whisk together egg whites and water. In another shallow dish combine KELLOGG’S SPECIAL K Multi-Grain cereal and jerk seasoning. Place flour on piece of wax paper.Coat chicken pieces with flour, shaking off excess. Dip in egg white mixture. Roll chicken in cereal mixture, gently pressing crumbs onto chicken pieces. Place in single layer on baking sheet lined with foil and coated with cooking spray. 3. Bake, uncovered, at 450°F for 10 to 12 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. 4. Meanwhile, in small bowl stir together salad dressing and lime peel. Serve chicken pieces and mango slices with salad dressing mixture.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
2 3/4 cups Kellogg’s® Special K® Multi-Grain cereal (crushed to 1 1/2 cups)
